typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only not the weth strategy or governance"

arguments.value: only not the weth strategy or governance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only not the weth strategy or governance"

nodes.documentation:
Adds liquidity to Uniswap. There is no vault for this cannot be invoked via controller. It has
to be restricted for market manipulation reasons, so only governance can call this method.
nodes.name: doHardWork

nodes.documentation:
Borrows the set amount of WETH from the strategy, and will invest all available liquidity
to Uniswap. This assumes that an approval from the strategy exists.
nodes.name: takeLoan

nodes.documentation:
Prepares for settling the loan to the strategy by withdrawing all liquidity from Uniswap,
and providing approvals to the strategy (for WETH) and to treasury (for FARM). The strategy
will make the WETH withdrawal by the pull pattern, and so will the treasury.
nodes.name: settleLoan

nodes.documentation:
If Uniswap returns less FARM and more WETH, the WETH excess will be present in this strategy.
The governance can send this WETH to the treasury by invoking this function through the
strategy. The strategy ensures that this function is not called unless the entire WETH loan
was settled.
nodes.name: wethOverdraft

doHardWork().notice: Adds liquidity to Uniswap. There is no vault for this cannot be invoked via controller. It has to be restricted for market manipulation reasons, so only governance can call this method.

settleLoan().notice: Prepares for settling the loan to the strategy by withdrawing all liquidity from Uniswap, and providing approvals to the strategy (for WETH) and to treasury (for FARM). The strategy will make the WETH withdrawal by the pull pattern, and so will the treasury.

takeLoan(uint256).notice: Borrows the set amount of WETH from the strategy, and will invest all available liquidity to Uniswap. This assumes that an approval from the strategy exists.

wethOverdraft().notice: If Uniswap returns less FARM and more WETH, the WETH excess will be present in this strategy. The governance can send this WETH to the treasury by invoking this function through the strategy. The strategy ensures that this function is not called unless the entire WETH loan was settled.
